label: 宮騒動
本: Court and Bakufu in Japan:  Essays in Kamakura History . Stanford University Press . 1982
説明文: Designation for the conspiracy of 1246 that sought to strengthen the hand of ex-Shogun Yoritsune; involved both Court and Bakufu personnel and led to stern disciplinary measures imposed by Kamakura.　[藤原(九条）頼経]
